actions.command: summon item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:player_head",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:'{"text":"Enderman Mask","color":"yellow","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"[+] You Have A 50% Chance To Dodge Projectiles Like An Enderman","color":"green","italic":false}','{"text":"[X] [Quinary Key] You Can Throw Ender Pearls","color":"light_purple","italic":false}','{"text":"[X] [Senary Key] Entering The Nether Allows You To Teleport There Without A Portal","color":"light_purple","italic":false}','{"text":"[X] [Septenary Key] Entering The End Allows You To Teleport There Without A Portal","color":"light_purple","italic":false}','{"text":"[=] Dimensional Travel May Teleport You In Bad Spots","color":"yellow","italic":false}','{"text":"[-] Dimensional Travel (From Ability) Makes You Nauseous","color":"red","italic":false}','{"text":"[-] You Cannot Travel To The End From The Nether And","color":"red","italic":false}','{"text":" -> Vice Versa, Doing So Will Use Up Your Cooldown","color":"red","italic":false}','{"text":"[-] You Cannot See Mobs / Players With A Pumpkin Head","color":"red","italic":false}','{"text":"[-] Water Hurts You","color":"red","italic":false}']},mob:7,type:4,SkullOwner:{Id:[I;1850552016,99109209,-1335040439,-653184183],Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvOTZjMGIzNmQ1M2ZmZjY5YTQ5YzdkNmYzOTMyZjJiMGZlOTQ4ZTAzMjIyNmQ1ZTgwNDVlYzU4NDA4YTM2ZTk1MSJ9fX0="}]}}}}}
